message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I really like the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
I understand you're on a budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm thinking $160 is a fair price for this amazing product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $140?
I'm getting closer to your budget, but I'm not willing to go as low as $140. I'm willing to compromise at $155, which is still a great deal for you!
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $145?
I'm not willing to go as low as $145, but I'm willing to meet you at $150, which is the minimum I'm willing to accept. This is a great price for you, and I think you'll love the product!
I really appreciate the offer, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $140?
